text: Gleisdreieck (Triangle of Rails) is the fourth studio album by German recording artist Joy Denalane. It was released by Nesola Records on March 3, 2017 worldwide and in German-speaking Europe. ==Track listing== Credits adapted from the liner notes of Gleisdreieck. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} == Release history == {| class="wikitable" |- !scope="col"|Region !scope="col"|Date !scope="col"|Format !scope="col"|Label |- |Austria |rowspan="3"|March 3, 2017 |rowspan="3"| |rowspan="3"|Nesola |- |Germany |- |Switzerland |- |} ==References== ==External links== * JoyDenalane.com — official site Category:2017 albums Category:Joy Denalane albums
title: Gleisdreieck (album)
